actions.message:
Hello, ${member}! Ready to update your changelog? Let's get started!
--
What version is this update?
--
Note: If you ever need to cancel at any point, just type "Cancel"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Ok! I'll remember your version for this changelog is `${globalVars("changelogVersion")}`
--
Now, what changes did you make since the last update?
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Alright! The changes you made since the last update are:

`${globalVars("changelogFeatures")}`

--

Here's a copy of the new changelog, does this look correct?
(If you reply no, then your changes won't be saved.)
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
The following changes were made since the last update!

${globalVars("changelogFeatures")}
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: That's not a valid response! Please reply with either "Yes" or "No"!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Sorry about that! I went ahead and discarded your changes. To restart, rerun this command!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: 💾 Excellent! I have saved your changes!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Cancelled.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
The following changes were made since the last update!

${globalVars("changelogFeatures")}
actions.name: Set Embed Description

>bank addmoney - Want to cheat and get rich fast? Quick use this command, You'll get $5,000!

actions.message:
>bank adminclose - Close the bank and let users that run the bank command know.
*note: Money earned by minigames and or shops will still work*
>bank open - Opens the bank up from being closed.
>bank setmoneyjoin - Set the default money when users join.

actions.message:
Ready to raid some bases? Here's the commands
!raid scout @usermention - Scout the base to see how much money the printers have.
!raid baseraid @usermention - Begin a base raid.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: If user doesn't do a param, send message.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: Store user data and params
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: End Of Storing
actions.name: Comment

actions.message: **The base is barricaded, We can't see in to see how much is in it! We'll have to raid it and then find out...**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: It appears the base has ${tempVars("overallprinterbalance")} currently.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Oh crap! It looks like we made have accidently set off the base's alarm when we were scouting!**
*Base is now on cooldown mode and can not be raided at the moment!*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Base Alert: User: ${tempVars("user")} has attempted to scout your base and set off the alarm. No money was stolen and the base was put in cooldown!**

*Tip: Security Camera's are pre-installed on every base and you'll get messages like these to let you know!*

**Base on Cooldown for the next 4 hours**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: **Preparing to raid..**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${mentionedUser} 's base has been targeted for a raid by ${tempVars("user")}!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Now we check if the base has barricades and or security.
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
Barricade blocks ${tempVars("user")} from entering the base! However the barricade is damaged and needs to be replaced to work again.
The raid has been stopped and the base is now on cooldown mode!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Really bad barricade if it breaks with one hit lol
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
There was a barricade in the base but it appears the contractor who put the barricade up, Forgot to do the entire job! and ${tempVars("user")} was able to head to the front door.
**Lockpicking**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Really bad barricade if it breaks with one hit lol
actions.name: Comment

actions.message: The barricade fell down with just one hit with a crowbar! ${tempVars("user")} found the backdoor and is now **lockpicking**!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
There was no barricade in the base and ${tempVars("user")} was able to head to the front door.
**Lockpicking**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: The lockpick worked and ${tempVars("user")} was able to enter the base.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
${tempVars("user")} has found the vault with the stored printer money.
*Also found printers*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: *Beginning to store money and printers in bags...*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Randomizing chance of getting caught
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
${tempVars("usermention")} has bought security for his base however ${tempVars("user")} manages to smoke them out with a smoke bomb, and also pulls out a pistol and start's firing!
*The security team runs out of the base, leaving ${tempVars("user")} to collect as much as possible!*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Not caught by security.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: Caught by security
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
${tempVars("usermention")} has bought security for his base. The security team manages to steal back a few bags from ${tempVars("user")} after a fight! Taking back any printers. But not all the money before ${tempVars("user")} fled. 
Also the team manages to steal some of ${tempVars("user")} wallet that was found on the ground. It had $1500 in it!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Now that ${tempVars("user")} is out of the base, it's now time to calcuate and see how much stuff they were able to steal!
*Notice, Even if a base doesn't have the amount paid out to the raider, The base will be in debt and will have to pay it off. Same with printers*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${tempVars("user")} escapes the base without any problems!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Now that ${tempVars("user")} is out of the base, it's now time to calcuate and see how much stuff they were able to steal!
*Notice, Even if a base doesn't have the amount paid out to the raider, The base will be in debt and will have to pay it off. Same with printers*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: This randomizes the printers stolen from the base! This part will be skipped if the user has been caught by security!
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: This randomizes the amount stolen from the base!
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: This sends a total amount of money stolen from the base.
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
${tempVars("user")} was able to steal ${tempVars("raidedamount")}!
They were also able to steal some printers.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: **The money stolen was put into your base for now.** Feel free to transfer it with the rest of your money printer money to the bank account.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
${tempVars("user")} has raided you. It's possible money printers and money have been stolen. Check your base status with !base info
If you bought security, the security may be gone too same with the barricades.

**Also, You're base is on cooldown for 4 hours, to protect against any other raids.** If your base is in debt and or has little to no money, It will not be raided**
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: **Raid Over** Cooldown in effect for base. Cooldown for this command is now set for 1 hour.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: This base is currently on cooldown, Try another base.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
**Hello!**

I see you have used the base command, but you did not specify the correct param.
Here is what you can do

**Help**
base setup - Setup a base on the server.
base buyprinter - Buy a Money Printer to use in your base to make money.
base buysecurity - Buy a security team to be used once in a raid.
raid - Raid a user's base, do raid @usermention to use. Cooldown 2 hours.

base transfer - Transfer the money printers current overall balance to your bank account. **Won't work if mayor has lockdown in effect**
base info - Do base info @usermention, Show's all status about the user's base. **Hopefully you won't try and use that to pick the good bases to raid hah**
or just do base info without a usermention to get your own status

base printstart - Start's Printers, Note, You will not get a message but the printers will start, check !base info to see.
base buybarricade - Buy a barricade to help protect your base!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Checks to see if user did a param, If not show message. Basically a help menu.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: Storing Param and other member releated stuff.
actions.name: Comment

actions.comment: End of Storeing lol :D
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
**Setup a base**
We found a old warehouse where you can setup the base there. See the help with !base for command info.

**Tasks**
Buy a money printer.
Cash out the money printer.
Build Defense (one time use per raid)
Raid Other's
Buy Security Guard's (one time use per raid)

We wish you good luck! To see your base status do !base baseinfo
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Welcome ${tempVars("username")} to the printer dealer. Let me check you're bank account before we contiune...
I also happen to sell security with !base buysecurity. $4000 though.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
This a joke, some camera prank show or you are just not rich? You don't even have $2000! Get out of here and get some money before trying to get some printers from me!
Wait, here's your wallet *steals wallet from your hands*, Look at dat, some money. I am going to take some of this money for my own.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: change the money removal amount and dialog to make it worse if you want xD. Printer Buy command ^
actions.name: Comment

actions.message: Good... You got enough. Here's the printer. *Sends printer to base*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Welcome ${tempVars("username")} to the Security Department. Let me check you're bank account before we contiune...
I also happen to know a friend who sells prints with !base buyprinter. $2000 though.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
This some dumb joke or what? You don't even have $4000! Get out of here and get some money before trying to hire security!
Looks like we were able to pull up some bank logs on you ${tempVars("username")} and found out you could owe debt possibly. Well. We may have added some!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: change the money removal amount and dialog to make it worse if you want xD. Security Buy Command ^
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
Good... You got enough. Here's the contract, We will attempt to protect you're base from a raid attack for one time use though.
Then we have to get out of there before are boss comes back from his coffee break. Though you can re-hire us again to protect you again.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.comment: Barricade Command Shop.
actions.name: Comment

actions.message:
Welcome ${tempVars("username")} to the Barricade Shop. Let me check you're bank account before we contiune...
We can help you barricade your base from theives and raiders.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
It appears the bank has rejected the order. **Error: Not enough money**
Please put more money in the bank then come back.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: Great! The order went through and the bank accepted. We will get to work barricadeing your base. This should hold up one time and can be re-bought after each raid.
actions.name: Send Message
